metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6516 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Policy bypass in CORS in Google Chrome prior to 84.0.4147.89 allowed aremote attacker to leak cross-origin data via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '84.0.4147.105-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
